text: wadhkuruu hin 'akhadhna ealaykum ehdana mwkdana bqabwl ma ja'akum bih musaa min altwrat, fnqdtm alehd, frfena jabal altuwr fawq rwwskm, waqulna lkm: khudhuu ma ataynakum bjddin, wasmaeuu watyeu, wa'illa asqtna aljabal elykm, fqltm: samiena qawlik waeasayna amrk; li'ana eibadat aleijl qad amtzjt bqlwbkm bsbb tmadykm fi alkfr. qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: qabuh ma yamurukum bih 'iimanukum min alkufr waldlal, 'iin kuntum msddiqyn bima 'anzal allah elykm
